name: AngularJS Docs Dark
description: A simple dark style for Angular docs (docs.angularjs.org). I'm no designer, so any suggestions are more than welcome :) (especially if they're code)
additional_info:
Newest update:
- Fixed white navbar and version/branch picker

Old updates:
- Fixed non-legible navy blue-coloured html tags in code sections

discussions.name: Great job! Just a few suggested changes
